problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum (Kadane's Algorithm)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an array of N integers (may contain negative numbers), find the contiguous subarray with the maximum sum.

Return the maximum sum.

This classic problem is solved using Kadane's Algorithm, which is essentially a DP approach.

DP Insight: At each position, decide whether to extend the previous subarray or start fresh.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
9
-2 1 -3 4 -1 2 1 -5 4

Sample Output
6

Explanation:
The subarray [4, -1, 2, 1] has the maximum sum = 6.
